activities: Medrio provides a hosted electronic data capture (EDC) system for use in clinical trails. Our customers use our system to enter, store and manage the data collected in the clinical trails that they conduct. This data may include personal information about study participants that is collected during the trial.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Our system allows our customers and their agents to capture and store data collected from clinical trials, which may include information about study participants. It does not include manually processed data.
recoursemech: We agree to work with the EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) in the event of unresolved complaints.
